thread.title: Real Housewife of Beverly Hills star Brandi Glanville reveals crush on Aussie Jason Dundas
thread.title_full: Real Housewife of Beverly Hills star Brandi Glanville reveals crush on Aussie Jason Dundas | The Courier-Mail

author: couriermail.com.au
title: Real Housewife of Beverly Hills star Brandi Glanville reveals crush on Aussie Jason Dundas
text:
Brandi Glanville, 42, interviewed Dundas for her show Brandi Glanville Unfiltered about his hosting role on America’s Best Dance Crew: Road to the VMAs .
Used my mad dance skillz with the host of #abdc @JasonDundas during our @PodcastOne interview! http://t.co/rP2g6XBqnF pic.twitter.com/UZrciFy7OO
— Brandi Glanville (@BrandiGlanville) July 22, 2015 She later took to twitter to share her lustful feelings for the 32-year-old.
“Why is it when ever (sic) a hot Aussie is in front of me all I can think about is sex ...#Hot,” she tweeted.
Glanville, who used to be married to Eddie Cibrian before he left her for country singer LeAnn Rimes, quizzed Dundas on his love life.
Fit ... Jason Dundas. Picture: Instagram Source: Supplied
Lookalike ... Brandi Glanville’s ex, actor Eddie Cibrian, looks a lot like Jason Dundas. Picture: Splash Source: Supplied
He said he had been in a relationship with Vogue editor Anna Wintour’s assistant, Rey-Hanna Vakili, but that it “fizzled out.”
“It just reached a point where I went to Fiji for five weeks to do a show ... but it just kind of fizzled away and then I moved to LA,” he said. “I haven’t really found anyone to date yet.”
Cast ... Yolanda Foster, Lisa Vanderpump, Brandi Glanville, Kyle Richards, Kim Richards, Eileen Davidson and Lisa Rinna in the Real Housewives of Beverly Hills. Picture: Supplied Source: Supplied
Dundas did reveal however that he had been trying Tinder to find a woman.
“Two days after arrived (in LA) I went on Tinder. And I tried Tinder, and I went on three dates in a matter of four hours ... but nothing really eventuated from Tinder,” he said.
Jason Dundas smoulders (Frame content direct link: https://instagram.com/p/uT46j3yGgU/embed .)
 Real Housewife reveals Dundas crush
